name: Boardy
title: boardy.app
shortDescription: Boardy allows users to create beautiful, auto-updating dashboards with ease. Utilizing pre-built modules, users can design and customize dashboards without needing coding skills or server management. Simply select a module, set parameters, and arrange them on your dashboard. This tool is ideal for individuals or businesses wanting to monitor data visually without technical overhead.
pros: No coding required to set up dashboards
API available for custom module integration
cons: Limited to pre-built modules unless using API
May not offer as much flexibility as full coding solutions
Dependent on the continuous addition of new modules
